# Adv. 1 Page 1

, — Today
]i We must apologize for not having published <[
yesterday, which under orders from President K.S. j>
Pitzer was Monday, because Friday was Saturday.
'! Because of the uncertainty generated by his
i[ announcement Wednesday, we are unclear as to whether ji
]i the calendar change affected other days and as to <[
<[ whether it conflicts with Gov. Reagan's announcement J 1
J 1 Wednesday that Thursday was actually Sunday. We are \
Ji sure however that Pitzer's announcement has confused i[
11 our Today Box staff so severely that they were unable Ji
ji to locate anything for May 11, whenever it does occur. i[
Wc must humbly ask that those of you who can J 1
<j straighten out the calendar situation call our news office \
Ji at 321-2300 x 4632, Call the business office to help you ![
<| sell whatever you 're pushing at 327-4150. Ji
